member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Settings.ExternalSettingsManager
member.summary: An implementation of the class that allows applications to access settings from Visual Studio or an isolated shell, either of which is selected by its AppID.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Settings.ExternalSettingsManager.CreateForApplication(System.String)
member.summary: Used to construct the SettingsManager for AppID-based Visual Studio applications.
member.param: The path of the executable Visual Studio application.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Settings.ExternalSettingsManager.CreateForApplication(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Used to construct the SettingsManager for AppID-based Visual Studio applications.
member.param: The path of the executable Visual Studio application.
Controls the logging of the package definition management operations at startup and shutdown.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Settings.ExternalSettingsManager.CreateForApplication(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Used to construct the SettingsManager for AppID-based Visual Studio applications that use suffixed mode. In suffixed mode, any changes to the settings are isolated from the normal running mode.
member.param: The path of the executable Visual Studio application.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Settings.ExternalSettingsManager.CreateForApplication(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Used to construct the SettingsManager for AppID-based Visual Studio applications that use suffixed mode. In suffixed mode, any changes to the settings are isolated from the normal running mode.
member.param: The path of the executable Visual Studio application.
Controls the logging of the package definition management operations at startup and shutdown.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Settings.ExternalSettingsManager.Dispose
member.summary: Releases the resources that are used by the current instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Settings.ExternalSettingsManager.GetApplicationDataFolder(Microsoft.VisualStudio.Settings.ApplicationDataFolder)
member.summary: Returns the folder that Visual Studio uses for storing various files such as cache files, backup files, and template files
member.returns: The full path of the requested folder.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Settings.ExternalSettingsManager.GetCollectionScopes(System.String)
member.summary: Outputs the scopes that contain the given collection.
member.param: The path of the collection to be searched.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Settings.ExternalSettingsManager.GetCommonExtensionsSearchPaths
member.summary: Returns the list of folders that Visual Studio uses to install or look for machine-wide extensions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Settings.ExternalSettingsManager.GetPropertyScopes(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Outputs the scopes that contain the given property.
member.param: The path of the collection of the property.
The name of the property to be searched.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Settings.ExternalSettingsManager.GetReadOnlySettingsStore(Microsoft.VisualStudio.Settings.SettingsScope)
member.summary: Provides the class for the requested scope which can be used for read-only operations.
member.returns: A instance that can be used to access the scope.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Settings.ExternalSettingsManager.GetWritableSettingsStore(Microsoft.VisualStudio.Settings.SettingsScope)
member.summary: Provides the class for the requested scope which can be used for reading operations and writing operations.
member.returns: A instance that can be used to access the scope.
member.exception: The given scope is not writable.
